Author: foxescanflyvu
Text: You should listen to ED Matters podcast, episode 156 & 157. It talks about the possible reasons why restriction makes anorexics feels so good. It changed my life.

Author: RosieNP
Text: Restricting and purging release endogenous opioids. That's part of why it's habit forming.  https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/m/pubmed/9150413/
